Shopify Slideshow Premium Section

Learn how to create a Slideshow Premium section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The Slideshow Premium section offers a dynamic and fully customizable slideshow experience for your Shopify store. Designed with versatility in mind, it features both image and video slides that can be enhanced with captions, buttons, and even star ratings. The slideshow supports autoplay, various aspect ratios, and responsive designs to create visually appealing presentations on both desktop and mobile devices.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Premium Sections
  3. Search for "Slideshow Premium"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  1. Product Features: Use the slideshow to highlight the key features of your top products. Each slide can include a high-quality image or video along with a detailed description and a call-to-action button.

  2. Customer Testimonials: Showcase customer reviews and testimonials to build trust with potential buyers. Utilize the star rating feature to visually emphasize the positive feedback.

  3. Sales and Promotions: Announce ongoing sales, discounts, and promotional campaigns. Include compelling visuals and effective calls-to-action to drive conversions.

  4. Brand Storytelling: Share the story behind your brand through a series of engaging images and videos. This can help in building a connection with your audience.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  • Font Options:

    • Override theme fonts: Toggle between your theme's default fonts and custom fonts.
    • Text Font: Custom font for the text within the slideshow.
    • Text Size: Adjust the size of the text.
    • Text Line Height: Choose the line height for the text.
    • Text Color: Customize the color of the text.
    • Headline Size: Adjust the size of headlines.
    • Headline Line Height: Choose the line height for headlines.
    • Headline Color: Customize the color of headlines.

  • Colors:

    • Background Color: Set the background color of the section.
    • Progress Background Color: Customize the background color of the progress indicator.
    • Progress Foreground Color: Choose the foreground color of the progress indicator.
    • Indicator Color: Set the color of the slide indicators.

  • Dimensions:

    • Max Width of Section: Define the maximum width of the section.
    • Padding (Top, Bottom, Left, Right): Customize the padding around the section.
    • Spacing between Elements: Adjust the spacing between elements within the section.

  • Button Style:

    • Primary Button Background Color: Customize the background color for primary buttons.
    • Primary Button Text Color: Set the text color for primary buttons.
    • Text Size: Adjust the text size for buttons.
    • Padding (Top/Bottom, Left/Right): Customize padding for buttons.
    • Border Radius: Adjust the roundness of button corners.
    • Border Size: Set the border size for buttons.
    • Border Color: Choose the border color for buttons.

  • Slideshow Settings:

    • Round Borders on Media: Adjust the roundness of media borders.
    • Subtle Shadow on Media: Toggle shadows on media elements.
    • Media Aspect Ratio: Choose the aspect ratio for media.
    • Mobile Image Aspect Ratio: Set the aspect ratio for images on mobile devices.
    • Image Width: Define the width for images requested from Shopify.
    • Mobile Image Width: Define the width for mobile images requested from Shopify.

  • Caption Settings:

    • Vertical Alignment: Align captions vertically.
    • Horizontal Alignment: Align captions horizontally.
    • Content Vertical Alignment: Align content within captions.
    • Caption Background Color: Customize the background color of captions.
    • Caption Padding: Set padding around the caption content.
    • Caption Margin: Adjust margins around captions.
    • Round Borders on Caption: Adjust the roundness of caption borders.
    • Show Glass Effect: Toggle the glass effect on captions.
    • Desktop Caption Width: Set the width of captions on desktop.
    • Mobile Caption Width: Set the width of captions on mobile.

  • Autoplay Settings:

    • Enable Autoplay: Toggle autoplay functionality for the slideshow.
    • Show Arrows: Toggle the visibility of navigation arrows.
    • Autoplay Time: Configure the interval time for autoplay slides.
